radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is unremarkable in appearance. No focal liver lesion is identified. No biliary dilatation is seen and the common duct measures 0.5 cm. Several small shadowing gallstones are seen within the gallbladder. The largest measures 5 mm. There is no gallbladder wall edema and no pericholecystic fluid is seen. The pancreas and midline structures including the aorta are obscured from view by overlying bowel gas. The spleen is unremarkable and measures 10.9 cm. No hydronephrosis is seen in either kidney. No ascites is seen in the upper abdomen. The visualized portion of the IVC is unremarkable.
